cast.name: 亚历山德鲁·波托切安 Alexandru Potocean

trans_title: 康斯坦丁·布朗库西之艺术重生
introduction: 3 stories, 3 characters in 3 periods of time are building the plot of the film. The main one is about the sculptor mature period, following his arrival in Paris , during his friendship with Modigliani and its relationship with Martha , one of his models , perhaps his favorite one . The second one is about a student of Fine Arts. Due to criticism of some of the Romanian Academy members who refused the legacy the sculptor wanted to leave to Romanian state, he was send for 13 years in prison. After being released, former security forces him to forgo many of the works of the sculptor.The third one has in its center a great scholar who lived in the XII century, in Tibet. He is the link between sculptor and forger, a link between their destinies.
chinese_title: 康斯坦丁·布朗库西之艺术重生
